summary: P4 inventory gate is now enforced in CI. The runner executes a mandatory two-step inventory gate (tests + repo validation), logs show both headers, and the legacy inventory validate path is no longer used. This audit artifact supersedes docs/audits/ABCS-P4-AUDIT-2026-02-11.json (FAIL) for the same phase gate condition.

violations.evidence: CI output still includes optional-tool skips (shellcheck/shfmt) and platform skip for smoke on non-Linux bash<4 environments.
violations.fix_guidance: For stronger CI evidence, run in an environment with shellcheck/shfmt and Linux bash>=4 so optional checks can execute. This does not block the required ci gate.

checks_run: make -n ci resolves to bash tools/check/run.sh.
tools/check/run.sh now prints == inventory check (tests) == and == inventory check (repo) == and runs bash tools/check/inventory_test.sh then bash tools/check/inventory.sh.
tools/check/inventory_test.sh exits 0 and includes CHECK/RESULT lines plus fatal ERROR coverage.
tools/check/inventory.sh exits 0 on repository inventory and emits sorted CHECK lines plus RESULT summary.
make ci exits 0 and includes the new inventory headers and CHECK/RESULT output; legacy inventory validate output is absent.
docs/INVENTORY-SCHEMA.md now matches implementation output contract for CHECK/RESULT and fatal ERROR format.
git diff --name-only -- inventory is empty (no inventory data changes).
